title: Drawing, "Furniture Designs, Modern"
medium: Graphite, green pencil on tracing paper, double ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamps: Small stamp in black ink at lower right: DONALD DESKEY/630 FIFTH AVENUE/NEWYORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at lower margin: W. AND J. SLOANE MODERN UPHOLSTERY LINE JAN. 1936; at left margin: NO/NO/NO/NO/NO Inscribed in graphite with design numbers throughout Inscribed in graphite with dimensions throughout
description: 6 tables, 4 chairs, 2 sofas Deskey numbers reading from upper left horizontally: 9220, 9220 9029, 9034,9227, 9227, 9031, 9032, 9228, 9228, 9033, 9030, 8420
